comment:
по клику на расписанный дикарскими надписями механизм, баркает Паскаль
новый обж

languages.text: "Варварские надписи, кощунственно нанесенные на плоть сей священной машины, повторяют слова реквиема почтительного отключения".
"The barbaric inscriptions blasphemously profaning the flesh of this sacred machine echo the words of the requiem of reverent shutdown."
languages.original_text: "Варварские надписи, кощунственно нанесенные на плоть сей священной машины, повторяют слова реквиема почтительного отключения".

traits.locale_text: "The barbaric inscriptions blasphemously tarnishing the flesh of this sacred machine echo the words of the requiem of reverent shutdown."
"The barbaric inscriptions blasphemously tarnishing the flesh of this sacred machine echo the words of the requiem of reverent shutdown."
"The barbaric inscriptions blasphemously profaning the flesh of this sacred machine echo the words of the requiem of reverent shutdown."
"The barbaric inscriptions blasphemously profaning the flesh of this sacred machine echo the words of the requiem of reverent shutdown."
"The barbaric inscriptions blasphemously profaning the flesh of this sacred machine echo the words of the requiem of reverent shutdown."
"The barbaric inscriptions blasphemously profaning the flesh of this sacred machine echo the words of the requiem of reverent shutdown."

languages.text: 「未開人の碑文は聖機械の中身を冒涜し汚しているが、レクイエムで使われる敬けんな停止文をまねているのだ」
languages.original_text: "The barbaric inscriptions blasphemously profaning the flesh of this sacred machine echo the words of the requiem of reverent shutdown."

traits.locale_text: 「未開人の碑文は聖機械の中身を冒涜し汚しているが、レクイエムで使われる敬けんな停止文をまねているのだ」

languages.text: “野蛮的铭文亵渎了这台神圣机器的躯体，虔诚停机安魂曲形成了共鸣。”
languages.original_text: "The barbaric inscriptions blasphemously profaning the flesh of this sacred machine echo the words of the requiem of reverent shutdown."

traits.locale_text: “野蛮的铭文亵渎了这台神圣机器的躯体，虔诚停机安魂曲形成了共鸣。”

languages.text: « Les inscriptions barbares qui profanent la chair de cette machine sacrée résonnent des mots du requiem d'un arrêt révérencieux. »
languages.original_text: "The barbaric inscriptions blasphemously profaning the flesh of this sacred machine echo the words of the requiem of reverent shutdown."

traits.locale_text: « Les inscriptions barbares qui profanent la chair de cette machine sacrée résonnent des mots du requiem d'un arrêt révérencieux. »

languages.text: «Las inscripciones bárbaras que profanan la carne de esta máquina sagrada con blasfemias imitan las palabras del ritual del apagado reverencial».
languages.original_text: "The barbaric inscriptions blasphemously profaning the flesh of this sacred machine echo the words of the requiem of reverent shutdown."

traits.locale_text: «Las inscripciones bárbaras que profanan la carne de esta máquina sagrada con blasfemias imitan las palabras del ritual del apagado reverencial».

languages.text: "Die barbarischen Inschriften, die auf blasphemische Weise das Fleisch dieser heiligen Maschine entweihen, kopieren die Worte des Requiems der ehrfürchtigen Abschaltung."
languages.original_text: "The barbaric inscriptions blasphemously profaning the flesh of this sacred machine echo the words of the requiem of reverent shutdown."

traits.locale_text: "Die barbarischen Inschrifen, die auf blasphemische Weise das Fleisch dieser heiligen Maschine entweihen, kopieren die Worte des Requiems der ehrfürchtigen Abschaltung."

languages.text: "Bu kutsal makinenin bedenini kirleten din dışı, barbarca yazmalar; saygılı bir kapatma ağıdının sözlerini taklit ediyor."
languages.original_text: "The barbaric inscriptions blasphemously profaning the flesh of this sacred machine echo the words of the requiem of reverent shutdown."

traits.locale_text: "Bu kutsal makinenin bedenini kirleten din dışı, barbarca yazmalar, saygılı bir kapatma ağıtının sözlerini taklit ediyor."
